casebody.data:
Daniel Joseph TRUHAN, Plaintiff
v.
Susan P. WALSTON and David M. Walston, Defendants and Third-Party Plaintiff, Susan P. Walston
v.
North Carolina Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company, United Services Automobile Association, and Western Surety Company, Third-Party Defendants. No. 364P14. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 10, 2015. Ann C. Ochsner, Raleigh, Donald E. Clark, Jr., Goldsboro, for Walston, Susan P. Bryan T. Simpson, Natalia K. Isenberg, Raleigh, for Truhan, Daniel, et al. Timothy W. Wilson, Rocky Mount, for North Carolina Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company. M. Greg Crumpler, Rocky Mount, for United Services Automobile Association. Donald E. Clark, Jr., Goldsboro, for Walston, David M. James D. Secor, III, for Argonaut Great Central Insurance Company. Jonathan M. Smith, Goldsboro. Fred Baggett, for N.C. Association of Chiefs of Police. Amy Y. Bason, General Counsel, for N.C. Association of County Commissioners. Wanda M. Copley, County Attorney, Sharon J. Huffman, Assistant County Attorney, for New Hanover County. Lowell L. Siler, Durham, for Durham County. Angela I. Carmon, for City of Winston Salem. R. Michael Cox, Pasquotank County Attorney, for Pasquotank County Debra Bechtel, for Catawba County. Sam Shames, for Gaston County. John F. Henning, Jr., Franklin, for Town of Franklin. Wesley L. Deaton, for Lincoln County. Huey B. Marshall, Bolivia, for Brunswick County. Edmond W. Caldwell, Jr., Executive Vice President and General Counsel, for N.C. Sheriffs' Association. Leon M. Killian, III, for Haywood County. Chester M. Jones, for Macon County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of October 2014 by Third-Party Defendants (United Services Automobile Association and North Carolina Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of June 2015."
